snippet: Gov. Mary Fallin signed legislation making Oklahoma the second state to ban a common second-trimester abortion procedure that critics describe as dismembering a fetus.
abstract: Oklahoma Gov Mary Fallin signs legislation making it second state to ban common second-trimester abortion procedure known as dilation and evacuation.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Mary Fallin signed legislation making Oklahoma the second state to ban a common second-trimester abortion procedure that critics describe as dismembering a fetus.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Governor Signs Curb on Abortion Procedure
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Governor Signs Curb on Abortion Procedure
